ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests23.descr: The &bImproved Upgrade&r gives you &aRedstone Mode&r control, and also allows you to change the &aDistribution mode&r, such as whether to deliver to the &afirst inventory&r, &aRound Robin&r, or &acompletely random&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests24.descr: The &bAdvanced Upgrade&r gives you access to the previous two modes, as well as &aFiltering&r. You can &awhitelist or blacklist&r selected items from being extracted by the pipes.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests25.descr: The &bUltimate Upgrade&r gives you all the previous benefits, while also transporting &aone stack at a time&r, making it the fastest option.
It is also significantly more expensive.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests26.descr: &b末影抽屉&r可以用&b连接工具&r&a调谐到某一频率&r。其他&b末影抽屉&r调谐到同一频率就可以有&a共享的物品栏&r。
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests27.title: Lateral Upgrades
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests27.descr: The &bCollector Upgrade&r will &apick up items&r dropped nearby.
The &bPulling Upgrade&r will &apull items from a nearby inventory&r.
The &bPushing Upgrade&r will... you guessed it! &aPush items&r to a nearby inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests28.title: Not Exactly a Pet
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests28.descr: There are many ways to carry items with you while you adventure, but not all of them are quite as terrifying as a &bLuggage&r. It has little concern for others, and loves to &agobble up dropped items&r. And yet, it's strangely endearing.
You can &6access its inventory with right click&r, and &6pick it up with shift right click&r. It &aretains its inventory&r when picked up, and it cannot die.

The &eLuggage&r can &awear a collar&r, which will grant it the enchanted abilities. However, &dplacing the Luggage in your inventory will delete the collar&r, so be sure to remove it before picking it back up.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests29.title: Upgrade your Luggage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests29.descr: The &eLuggage&r, when &astruck by lightning&r, will have its inventory increased.

The easiest way for this to happen is to use a &aRitual of Zapping&r, for which you'll need a &bRitual Tablet&r and a &bBrazier&r. &6Place the tablet and right click&r to begin the ritual. If you want to zap &amultiple creatures&r, you must &aprovide Source&r to the ritual.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests30.descr: Did you know that you can &aTransmit items wirelessly using &bSculk&r? The communications sent along the &amycelial sculk network&r can carry data so complex that it &amanipulates reality&r. Thus, it can take an item from one place and transfer it to another.
To begin with, you'll want a &bGuidebook&r, and to &6harvest some &bSculk&r.
&6Read the chapter \"Gathering Materials\"&r to begin with, to find out what you will need.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests31.title: The Sculk Network Basics
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests31.descr: The first tools you'll need are an &bEmitter&r - to send out items - and a &bReceiver&r - to, well, receive them.

The &bEmitter&r must be &6placed on top of the &bSculk Barrel&r in order to function. The &bSculk Receiver&r, however, can input into &amost basic inventory blocks&r such as Chests, Barrels, and Drawers. It &acannot deposit directly&r into a &bDrawer Controller&r, but you can use &bPipez&r or &bPulling Upgrades&r to withdraw the items into your Drawers.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests32.title: Extending the Range
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests32.descr: By default, &bEmitters&r and &bReceivers&r have to be &awithin 8 blocks of one another&r to function. However, you can &aextend that distance&r by &6placing down Sculk Transmitters&r.
The &bTransmitters&r can also be configured to &aaccept or deny&r certain items placed on their sides. You can &6read more about this&r in the Guidebook.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests33.title: Quantity Modifiers
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests33.descr: The different levels of &bQuantity Modifiers&r will allow &bSculk Emitters&r to transfer and store up to &a64 items&r at a time!
&bReceivers&r and &bTransmitters&r cannot receive these upgrades, but will work with the items sent to them by the &bEmitter&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests34.title: Speed Modifiers
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests34.descr: As you could probably guess, &bSpeed Modifiers&r allow &bEmitters&r and &bReceivers&r to perform their tasks at higher speeds. Do note that &bTransmitters&r work as fast as they can, and can bottleneck transmission.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests36.descr: The &bFilter Destination Tool&r is a multi-use tool which will allow you to &aset the destination&r of a &bfiltered item type&r.
You can assign it an inventory by &6right clicking it &lon the face of the block the &bPipe&6 connects to&r. It will not work if you do not select the correct face of the inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests37.title: Not Quite A Chest
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests37.descr: &eEnder Luggages&r are a tight knit group- unlike regular &eLuggages&r, every&e Ender Luggage&r you own will share the same storage space!
it's just like an &bEnder Chest&r- with feet!
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests38.title: Upgrading Your Storage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests38.descr: Basic chests and barrels are fine for a while, but the canny witch knows that &athe rules of inventory space&r are meant to be broken. With a little magic, you can easily make your storage bigger - &aand smarter&r!
Let's begin with a simple &bBarrel&r. Place it in the world as usual, and then &6right click it with the &bBasic Tier Upgrade&r.
Now, once you enter the inventory, you'll see some new additions.
The slot to the left &aaccepts upgrades&r which allow your storage to perform certain functions.
The &acog wheel&r on the right gives you access to your &astorage settings&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests39.descr: Within your storage settings, you have the ability to change the way your storage behaves.
Select the &aBarrel icon&r to choose whether your settings apply to &aPlayer&r - ie, &oall&r your storages  - or &aStorage&r - ie, this container only.
Select the &aA/Z icon&r you can select (with &6left click&r) or deselect (with &6right click&r) slots to be auto-sorted.
Select the &aBrain icon&r to &6choose slots to be locked to the item currently in them&r.
Select the &aSword icon&r to choose a slot whose &aitem will be displayed&r on the front of your storage.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests40.title: More Storage, More Upgrade
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests40.descr: There are two ways you can upgrade your storage, &alevel by level&r, or &abasic on upwards&r.
Assuming you used the reward from the last quest, you'll now have an &bIron Barrel&r. You can upgrade this to &aGold tier&r with an &bIron to Gold Upgrade&r. This is taking it up &alevel by level&r.
To upgrade from &aBasic upwards&r, you'll need the &bBasic to Gold&r (or other level) Upgrade. This will, as you could guess, take a &bBasic Storage&r and bring it directly to &aGold tier&r.
With each tier of upgrades, &ayour storage improves&r. At Gold tier it has &amore slots and an additional upgrade slot&r on the left.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests41.title: Stack Higher
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests41.descr: Your Sophisticated &bBarrels&r and &bChests are capable of &aholding more than a stack per slot&r, if you use the &bStack Upgrades&r on them. The higher the tier, the more stacks each slot can hold.
You can also &ause more than one Stack Upgrade&r, and they will add &amultiplicatively&r!
So if you use a &bTier 1&r and a &bTier 2&r, you will hold 2 stacks by 4 stacks, meaning 8 stacks, or &d512 items per slot&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests42.subti: Pack it up, Pack it in
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests42.descr: &bPacking Tape&r is an incredibly helpful item which can be used to &apackage up a storage block&r for transport. Although &dit can only be used on Sophisticated Storage&r.
You need to &6right click the &bTape&r onto the desired item. Then you can &6break the block&r and it will retain its inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests43.descr: The &bVoid Upgrade&r is an item which will &aremove unwanted items from your storage&r. It will, quite simply, delete them, ensuring that your storage is both well-organized and your server un-crashed. &dIt is especially important to use this upgrade for farms&r!
You can configure it to &adelete only overflow items&r or, if you prefer, &adelete all items of specific type&r.
The &bAdvanced Void Upgrade&r is capable of sorting by NBT and Damage levels.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests44.title: Process Your Inventory
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests44.subti: your storage has a right to due process
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests44.descr: These upgrades will help you &aprocess items in your storage&r, by smelting, blasting, or smoking. The &aautomatic versions&r will do so without the player needing to manually input the items.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests45.descr: The &bFilter Upgrade&r is meant to be used in conjunction with &bPipez&r or other item transport system.
It will &ahelp control what items get placed&r in the storage you use it on.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests46.title: Crafting Upgrades
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests46.descr: The &bCrafting&r and &bStonecutter&r upgrades provide those &acrafting interfaces&r in the storage you place them in.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests47.descr: To &aremotely link Sophisticated Storages&r which are not touching the main network, you need to &6place a &bStorage Link&6 on them&r, and then &6right click the &bStorage Tool&r on the &bLink&r and the &bStorage Controller&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.title: 末路之地
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests0.title: 获得末影之眼
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests0.descri: 通常情况下，想要去&d末地&r就需要原版的&b末影之眼&r，通往末地既要寻找传送门又要填满末地传送门。然而， 魔法已经改变了这个世界，这使得我们更难去往最后的维度。
取而代之的是，需要16种用不同方式找到的末影之眼（你需要找到其中的12颗）。&6查看接下来的任务&r以获取更多关于获取末影之眼的信息。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests1.descri: 这些新物品中的第一个就被叫做&b远古之眼&r，它曾经属于现已灭绝的大沙虫之一。这只蜡黄的眼睛可以在&d沙漠神殿&r的箱子里找到。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests2.descri: &b下界之眼&r增加属于一个恶魔，但在以太和下界之战中失去了它。它可以在箱子里被找到——你猜一下是哪里的箱子——是&d下界要塞&r的。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests3.descri: &b寒冰之眼&r曾经属于一位冰术师，可以在&d冰屋的隐藏地下室&r中找到。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests4.descri: &b无赖之眼&r可以在&d丛林神庙&r中找到，并且它还被赋予了祖先的红石智慧。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests5.descri: &b漆黑之眼&r曾经有人看到在宏伟的黑珍珠号上看到过，但是现在被掩埋在地底的&d掩埋的宝藏&r中。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests6.descri: 开始一个&a袭击&r可能是获得&b魔力之眼&r最简单的方式，因为这颗眼睛&e唤魔者&r才有了强大力量。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests7.descri: 据说是由最早的铁匠锻造而成，&b迷离之眼&r据说可以在地壳深处的&d废弃矿井&r中找到。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests8.descri: 有许多关于&b腐化之眼&r的谣言，其中就有说它能给持有者带来无尽的财富。然而，拥有它的贪婪国王最后也不知所踪，所以那些谣言并非真实。传闻它被保存在&d劫掠者前哨站&r的某处。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests9.descri: 你也许能猜到&b守卫者之眼&r的位置了。在波涛汹涌的海面下，在&e远古守卫者&r的肚子里。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests10.descr: 想要获得&b女巫之眼&r，你必须&d杀死一个邪恶女巫&r并且获得&b巫瞳&r，然后把它和&b末影之眼&r合成在一起。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests11.descr: &b诅咒之眼&r可以在&d堡垒遗迹&r中的宝藏室的箱子找到。它是一个强大的破坏性神器，猪灵将会用它们的生命来捍卫。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests12.descr: &b邪恶之眼&r象征着庇护，它会凝视着持有者的敌人。这可以从&d大师级别的牧师&r那购买。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests13.descr: 据说这只眼睛受到亡灵的青睐。&b不死之眼&r可以用一个&b不死之魂&r合成，不死之魂需要靠击杀&e骷髅马&r来获得，或者大量&e幽灵&r。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests14.descr: &b异国之眼&r与亚特兰蒂斯密切联系着——传说人们用它来寻找沉没的城市，但没有人回来证实过这一说法。&6用水中的物品合成它&r。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests15.descr: 你做到了！你通关了。恭喜你，你现在可以回家了。
……额，你还是呆着吧。这……哦对！你可以看看别的任务，趁你现在还在这里！
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests16.descr: 你杀了两头末影龙？哇哦，你真厉害。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests17.title: 终焉之始
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests17.descr: 你找到了去往&d末地&r的路，恭喜你。并祝你好运，你的旅途将会继续下去。
记住如果你想要探索虚空，你可以坐上你的&b扫帚&r，或者驯服一只&e末地鲸&r。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests18.descr: 你可能只需要12颗&b眼睛&r去进入&c末地&r，但如果你收集了所有的眼睛，你将获得大量奖励。
只要你&6收集了所有的眼睛&r，你就可以勾选这个按钮并获得一套特别的护甲。
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests20.title: 主宰末地
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests20.descr: 在&b蛋&r里面游泳？这听起来不太好，你可以&a用&b龙蛋&r交换&b龙首&r。
ftbquests.chapter.twilight_forest.title: 暮色森林
ftbquests.chapter.twilight_forest.quests: Reach the Twilight Forest
Entering a crepuscular zone
Welcome to the Twilight Forest! This dimension can be dangerous to navigate, although it is convieniently laid out with its &amajor landmarks in a grid&r.
The first thing you will want is a &bMap&r, and for that, you'll need to find a &eRaven&r.
And remember! &6If you get lost or wander into an inaccessible zone, look for Kobolds&r. They will be carrying the journal of previous adventurers, which will clue you in to your next goal.
Obtain a Portal Key
Throw it in a limpid pool and then back away

&dThe Twilight Forest&r is a night-ridden dimension filled with mysteries and odd creatures both friendly and hostile. Freely traveling the dimension is difficult - you must conquer each challenge in turn in order to traverse.

To &amake the portal&r, you must &6dig a 3x3x1 (or 2x2x1) hole and fill it with water&r. Then, &6surround the pond with flowers or mushrooms&r. Finally, &6throw a Diamond into the pool&r. Beware, opening a portal can be dangerous!
Find a Forest Raven
Unfortunately, you have to kill it

The &eForest Raven&r is a creature that can often be found near &aObsidian Obelisks&r in the Twilight Forest. It can be &6slain for it's feathers&r, which are important for making the &bMagical Map Focus&r.
Come on, Focus!
Craft a &bMagic Map Focus&r with a &bRaven Feather&r, some &bGlowstone Dust&r, and &bTorchberries&r (which can be found in Twilight Forest caves).
Then you can surround it with &bPaper&r to create a Magic Map, which will prove invaluable to your quest through the &dTwilight Forest&r.
Find a Hedge Maze
Now you can be a Hedge Witch!
One of the features in the Twilight Forest is the &aHedge Maze&r. It is a labyrinth filled with spawners and chests full of loot!
It does not count towards, nor require, any progression through the Forest.
Obtain an Ore Magnet
I'm a total ore magnet

The &bOre Magnet&r can sometimes be found inside &dHollow Hills&r, and when used, will &apull entire veins of ores from the ground&r! Simply &6hold right click while aiming at the ground&r and the ores will be moved up to you!
It can be enchanted with Unbreaking or Mending.
Steel yourself
&bSteeleaf&r is a material which can be used to create pre-enchanted armor that is slightly better than Iron.
Additionally, blocks of Steeleaf will reduce fall damage by 25% when landed on.
Obtain Liveroot
These roots...they're alive!

Break down the &aLiveroots&r beneath a Tree in order to obtain them. This item can be combined with &bIron&r and &bGold&r in order to create &bIronwood&r, which can be used to create pre-enchanted pieces of gear.
Obtain the Peacock Feather Fan
Ostentatious but very useful
The &bPeacock Feather Fan&r is an item which sends out a mighty gust of wind when &6right clicked&r.
You can use this to gain an advantage in combat, or even to give yourself a boost in midair, when jumping or using &bElytra&r!
You might want to sit down for this one

&bThe Moonworm Queen&r is an...item...that is filled with Moonworms. When you &6right click her&r, they will be dispensed - either directly onto a surface, or shot like an arrow. The moonworms serve no purpose other than &aas a light source&r. You can replenish the Queen by crafting her with &bTorchberries&r, and get...even more worms. Yay.
Uncraftables are delicious. Wait...

One of the most valuable items in the game, &bThe Uncrafting Table&r allows you to &arecoup materials from crafted items&r in exchange for experience levels. &6Place the unwanted item in the left slot&r and then &6click one of the ingredients&r in the center to remove it.
Find a Naga Courtyard
Nag your local Naga
The first boss you must face is the block-destroying &eNaga&r. It is a long serpent who slowly shrinks in length as you damage him.
If the player flees the courtyard, the Naga will return to the center.
Once he's defeated, &6be sure to loot the chest that he spawns&r, as you will need the &bNaga Trophy&r inside of it.
Purchase Quest: 20 Naga Scales
A chance to use unwanted scales
Defeat &eNaga&r in the &dTwilight Forest&r to obtain their scales. Then, relinquish those scales in exchange for loot!
Where my liches at?
Inside the &dLich Tower&r is the undead noble of the Twilight Forest. His &aCastle&r is fraught with mobs, but also filled with loot.
It is recommended to be well-geared before attempting this structure.
At the top of the tower, you will find the &eLich&r, who is surrounded by a shield which protects him. &6He must be defeated first with his own magic&r, then martial might can finish the fight.
And beware of the copies he summons during the fight!
Defeating the &eLich&r grants you access to the &dYeti's Lair&r, the &dDark Forest&r, and the &dSwamp&r.
Find a Lich Tower
Unfortunately, no Goblin Kings here...
The Labyrinth, found in the depths of &dthe Swamp&r, houses a number of nasty creatures, culminating in the vicious &eMinotaurs&r and &eMinoshroom&r.
The Minoshroom will drop &bMeef Stroganoff&r, which when eaten, will innoculate you against the curse of the &dFire Swamp&r, allowing you to progress.
Discover the Labyrinth
Keep your charming ways
The &bCharm of Keeping&r sacrifices itself to keep your inventory safe!
The first tier, Bronze, saves your &aheld item&r. Iron saves your &aheld item, and armor&r. Gold preserves &ayour entire inventory&r!
Helpful if you don't want to try to find your way back to your grave, or if you may die in the void.
砍掉一头，长出两个！
The &eHydra&r is a fearsome foe that is only weak in one place: within its fire-spewing maw!

It is best to take on this fight with &a Fire Resistance&r, and make sure you &aim attacks at the Hydra's open mouths&r! You can use a &branged weapon&r, or use a sword to &adeflect their bombs&r back at them.
Once you have defeated the beast, you have completed one task which will let you challenge the Highlands.
Find a Hydra's Lair
Obtain the Mazebreaker
为什么你要破坏一个完美无瑕的迷宫呢？
There is little point trying to mine through the incredibly tough blocks of the Labyrinth. Unless, however, you loot this item: &bThe Mazebreaker&r.
This tool mines Labyrinth blocks faster, and with less durability loss, than any other. It can be looted from the Labyrinth chests.
Purchase Quest: 20 Fiery Blood
A chance to use unwanted blood
Earn yourself some loot by slaying a few Hydras and trading in their blood for a chance at something valuable!
Better bring some extra torches
Located in the gloomy depths of the &dDark Forest&r, the Knight Stronghold is infested with &eGoblins&r, and you cannot enter without one of the &bTrophies&r from the previous bosses.
You can use &bMaze Maps&r here, but the structures are so massive that you may need a number of them.
It is recommended to &6mark your path with torches&r to ensure that you don't double back by mistake.

The end of this dungeon contains a fight against the &eKnight Phantoms&r. These will not follow you out of the room, and can swarm you if you simply charge in. It is recommended to &6retreat out to the hallway periodically if healing is needed&r.
Once you defeat them, you can now challenge the &dDark Tower&r.
Find the Knight Stronghold
Even more charming
The Charm of Life is essentially a Totem of Undying. The unupgraded version gives you 4 hearts and several seconds of Regen.
The upgraded version fully revives you, and grants Regen, Fire Resistance, and Resistance.
I ain't afraid of no ghast
In the Center of the &dDark Forest&r, the Dark Tower can be found. It is a massive structure, filled with monsters, and ruled over by a deadly &eUr-Ghast&r.
There are four smaller turrets, each containing a &bTower Key&r. These keys are used to unlock the central tower. There are many challenges here to undergo, so be prepared for a long expedition.
To defeat the &eUr-Ghast&r, you must defeat his &eCarminite Ghastlings&r in the nearby rooms, near the Ghast Traps. Then and when the beast draws near, activate the trap.
The Ur-Ghast is one of the 3 bosses you must defeat to access the &dHighlands&r.
Find the Dark Tower
Find the Yeti Cave
Are you ready? Not yeti
The Yeti Cave can be found in the Snowy Forest, and houses both &eYetis&r (which are neutral), and the &eAlpha Yeti&r, who is the boss you must face in this area.
Engaging this foe in melee combat can be dangerous, but even at range one must &abeware of falling icicles&r!
His death will grant you access to &dthe Glacier&r.
There's an Elsa joke in here somewhere
The &eSnow Queen&r is found at the top of the &dAurora Palace&r, a treacherous mansion filled with icy monsters and slippery parkour.
The Queen herself has three phases, and cannot be damaged through her &aIce Throne&r, so only her upper body can be targeted.
When she is defeated, you have completed one of three tasks to gain access to &dThe Highlands&r.
Find the Aurora Palace
Finally: The Highlands!
You did it!
You've finally reached the Highlands! This is going to sound suspicious, but hear me out: you need to find some &bMagic Beans&r.
You can obtain some either by killing &eTrolls&r underground, or by looting their obsidian-bound Caches.
Then, find a large patch of &bUberous Soil&r, above which the &eGiants&r live. You'll need to defeat their Miner to obtain his &bGiant Pickaxe&r.
Then, you can &6return underground and use the Giant Pick&r to break open the large Obsidian Vault. It will take a while.
Gain Access to the Final Castle
A thankless task
In the heart of the &cThorns&r lies a castle which holds the final boss - a &epowerful Kobold&r strong enough to &abreak the back of the Warden with ease&r.
However, whether or not to defeat this being is up to you. &aThere is no reward for doing so&r. No accolades. This quest grants you the only thanks you will get.
With that in mind, will you still challenge them?
Defeat the Naga
Defeat a Lich
Defeat the Knight Phantoms
Defeat the Ur-Ghast
Eat Meef Stroganoff
Defeat the Aurora Snow Queen
Complete the Quest Ram
Find yourself a &eQuest Ram&r and you'll notice it seems to be missing something.
Maybe give it some &amore wool&r. Specifically, &6one of each color of wool&r.
Complete the Twilight Forest
Once you complete the &eFinal Castle&r, obtained the &bLamp of Cinders&r, and even &6Completed the &eQuest Ram&r, you will finally have earned this unique armor set. Wear it with pride!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.title: Wildlife
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests0.title: Meet the Cosmaw
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests0.subti: So very Cosmaw-politan, don't you think?
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests0.descr: The &eCosmaw&r is a being which, when tamed, will &arescue its owner from falling into the void&r. It does not defend the player in other ways, however.
It can be &6tamed with Cosmic Cod&r, its natural prey.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests1.title: Meet a Mungus
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests1.descr: The &eMungus&r can be found in Mushroom biomes and is a living meme. It drops &bMungal Spores&r periodically every few days, and this item can be used to breed it.
&bMushrooms&r can be placed upon it, at which point it will target that same type of mushroom and attempt to spawn more of it, or turn it to its giant variant.
A &eMungus&r which has 5 mushrooms on its back will explode when slain, changing the small nearby area to a Mushroom Fields.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests2.title: Create a Bunfungus
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests2.descr: Feed a &eRabbit&r some &bMungal Spores&r to create a &eBunfungus&r, a rather large and disturbing neutral creature which will defend the nearby area. They can be healed with &bCarrots&r, and drop &bBunfungus&r meat, which can be used in cooking.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests3.title: Meet the Mimicube
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests3.descr: The &eMimicube&r is a defender of End Cities, and is capable of mimicking its attacker by developing armor, shields, and even weapons to match those of the player. When defeated, they drop &bMimicream&r, which can be used in crafting, or to &aduplicate almost any item, including enchantments&r!
Simply &6surround the desired item&r with 8 Mimicream, and ta-da! The result will have no durability, but it's a powerful tool nevertheless.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests4.title: Meet a Snuffle!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests4.descr: The &eSnuffle&r is a passive creature with a permanent blep. It can be found in snowy biomes, and &atamed with potatoes&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests5.title: Meet the Quacklings
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests5.descr: Quacklings are bizarre, yet friendly creatures that primarily live in Swamps. They can be traded with, just like human villagers!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests6.descr: The &eGuster&r is an elemental spirit which can appear during storms. It will throw nearby entities or items up into the air, and are &aresistant to arrows&r.

Once defeated, they can drop their &bEyes&r, which can be used either to make a &bPocket of Sand&r, to throw in the face of your enemies - or the &bGustmaker&r, a block which acts as a fan when provided with a Redstone signal.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests7.descr: Earn this by successfully &abreeding two Froststalkers&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests8.descr: The &bFroststalker&r helmet is worn to convince &eFroststalkers&r that the player is one of them.
It must be crafted from one of their horns. Once it is worn, you can &6breed them with pork&r - but be warned, taking off the helmet will &dmake the babies hostile as well&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests9.descr: These can be obtained by &acrafting&r, and are used to &afully tame a &eTusklin&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests10.desc: The &eTusklin&r, found in snowy biomes, can be saddled and ridden wild, but will buck the player off after a while. They can be bred with &bBrown Mushrooms&r, but their young will still be mostly feral.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests11.subt: Just gonna throw my baby at you real quick
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests11.desc: The &eStraddler&r is a bizarre and hostile creature who will throw their young at you to do damage. For the most part, defeating them yields &bBasalt&r, however they can rarely drop &bStraddlite&r.

&bStraddlite&r is a material which can be crafted into a Straddleboard, an enchantable board which can &asurf quickly across lava&r. This is an improvement over the &bObsidian Boat&r due to its speed, enchantability, and ability to jump!
And, as a side note, the &eStradpoles&r can be nabbed in a bucket and also &asurvive in water&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests12.desc: The &eVoid Worm&r is a boss fight which can be summoned by throwing a &bMysterious Worm&r into the void in &dThe End&r. He summons crystalline projectiles, has a devastating bite, and is capable of opening portals.

When defeated, it drops its &bEyes&r and &bBeak&r. These can be crafted into a &bDimensional Carver&r: a pickaxe which can mine a temporary portal through space and to the player's spawn point, and the &bVoid Worm Effigy&r: a trophy that, when provided with redstone signal, chomps down on whatever is in front of it.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests13.subt: I don't give a damn about my reputation
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests13.desc: The &eRocky Roller&r dwells in Dripstone Caves and will roll at its prey to crush them. It is weak but the strong armor on its back will protect it from most blows.

If it drops its &bRocky Hide&r, this can be crafted into a chestplate which allows the player to &aroll into mobs&r and damage them while sprinting. It will also cause the player to &asink in water&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests14.desc: This item seeks out the rarest creature in the world: the &eDevil's Hole Pupfish&r, a creature which spawns only in a single chunk, ever, in a given world.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests15.desc: The &eSkelewag&r is a common mount for &eDrowned&r, and lives near Shipwrecks. It is a fearsome foe, but is worth defeating, as it can drop &bFish Bones&r, which allow the player to craft the &bStrange Fish Finder&r.
The &aSkelewag&r also has an exceptionally small chance at dropping the &bNovelty Hat&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests16.desc: Should one happen upon an &eEndergrade&r - an extremophile living in the void of The End - they can place a saddle on its back. However, in order to control its extremely slow flight, a &bChorus Fruit on a Stick&r is needed.
They can be lured and bred with &bChorus Fruit&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests17.subt: Not to be confused with the delicious cappuchino monkey
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests17.desc: The &eCapuchin Monkey&r is a friendly beast which can be tamed with &bBananas&r, which drop from Jungle Tree Leaves. They can be bred with &bMaggots&r, which drop from &eFlies&r, and healed with &bEggs&r.
These monkeys can also be told to &aperch on your shoulder&r, where they will throw items at your enemies. If you find a rare &bAncient Dart&r, you may give it to them to grant them extra damage.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests18.desc: A saddle which allows the player to ride a &eLavathian&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests19.subt: Much nicer than the other kind of mimic
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests19.desc: The &eMimic Octopus&r is an incredible being that is found in &aWarm Oceans&r. They can be tamed with &bLobster Tails&r, at which point they will follow you and transform to try to scare off any enemies you may encounter.
Give your Octopus an &bInk Sac&r to toggle whether it can randomly change color.
Give it some &bPrismarine Shards&r to give it a Guardian-like appearance.
Give it a &bPufferfish&r if you'd like it to look like one of those, and hmm. I wonder what happens if you give one &bGunpowder&r?
Feed it some &bMimicream&r to teach it the abilities of whatever creature you've given it!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests20.subt: Not to be confused with lavasioth
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests20.desc: These beasts cannot be tamed, but they can be ridden.
Place a &bStraddlite Saddle&r and &bStraddlite Pack&r on their backs, and up to 4 players can ride these massive creatures.
They can be placed in water to &aharden into an obsidian variant&r, and can be &ahealed&r with &bMagma Cream&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests21.desc: The &eSpectre&r is a ghostly creature that dwells in The End. It can be lured in with a &bSoul Heart&r (obtained from Vultures in the Nether), and leashed with a Lead, then ridden like a balloon.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests22.desc: The &eFlutter&r is a passive mob which loves flowers.
It can be tamed if given some, but &deach flower must be a different type&r or it won't accept them.
It will defend its owner if told to follow - and can be given a &bFlower Pot&r to rest in. &6Shift click the potted Flutter&r to pick it up for transport.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests23.subt: Jellyfish in the sky~ I can go twice as high~
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests23.desc: Defeat a &eRainbow Jelly&r to obtain a drop which can craft &bRainbow Glass&r. You can also &6right click it onto an entity&r to paint that entity rainbow. Wipe them clean with a sponge, if you wish.
I wonder what would happen if you ate it?
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests24.titl: The Rarest Fish in the World
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests24.desc: The &aDevil's Hole Pupfish&r is the rarest being in the world, spawning in only a single chunk - EVER - in any given world.
Find one with a &bStrange Fish Locator&r. Or, you know, get extremely lucky.
The ponds they spawn in are usually underground. These fish love to nibble on &bMoss Blocks&r, and will sometimes breed after doing so!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests25.desc: &eCatfish&r, which come in three different size categories, will habitually &aswallow up dropped items or smaller entities&r they come across.
However, if they take any damage - or encounter a sea pickle, which they loathe - &athey will eject the contents of their stomachs&r.
One can &6lure them in&r with a &bSea Lantern&r, and grab them with a &bBucket&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests26.subt: You have an appointment with Moby Dick
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests26.desc: The &aCachalot whale&r, more commonly called Sperm whale, is a massive creature that dwells in &aLukewarm, Cold, or Deep Oceans&r.
Sometimes they &abecome beached&r during storms, and if you were to &6push one back out to sea&r it may thank you with a gift of &bAmbergris&r.
It likes to prey on &eGiant Squid&r, and will sometimes drop one of its teeth during a hunt.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests27.desc: &eRanchu Goldfish&r are a chubby fish that love to eat &bWater Lettuce&r, which can be used to breed them.
There are &aover 300 variants&r of the Ranchu Goldfish!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests28.desc: Defeat a &eRocky Roller&r and obtain its shell, plus get this little bonus!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests29.desc: While some &eElephants&r are large and occasionally aggressive, there are variants which are &asmall and friendly&r. These &eElephants&r can be &6tamed with &bPeanuts&r, and will &ahelp you water your gardens&r!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests30.subt: Hummingbirds are the sharks of the sky
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests30.desc: &eHummingbirds&r are tiny birds which pollinate nearby plants.
You can attract them using a &bHummingbird Feeder&r filled with &bWater&r and &bSugar&r,
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests31.desc: This delightful item not only &aplays a lovely tune&r when you &6hold right click while holding it&r, but it also &asummons all non-sitting pets nearby&r to your location.
You can optionally bind your flute to a specific pet by &6shift right clicking&r on the animal with the flute.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests32.desc: Gain this advancement by taming and befriending an animal!

Using the reward from this quest, you can right click to place an entity in your inventory so you can easily move them large distances. Simply &6right click the Mob Cage on the animal, and then right click it on a block&r to place the animal down again.
You can also &6shift right click&r to place it&r! It's totally normal to put your best friends in cages.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests33.subt: Animal husbandry is different than the name sounds
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests33.desc: Find two animals and breed them in order to get this advancement and begin these quests!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests34.titl: Get an Apple for your Straw Golem
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests34.desc: &eStraw Golems&r get hungy! If they don't get a delicious apple-y snack every day or so, they slow down to a snail's pace, and eventually &asit and pout until fed&r. They adore bright, shiny, red &bApples&r, and will follow you if you are holding one!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests35.desc: 想要一些帮手帮忙收获你的作物吗？你很幸运，因为你的魔法能够创造生命！小不点&e稻草傀儡&r将帮你收获你的作物。
尽管听起来稻草傀儡是由稻草制成的，但事实上构成它们的是干草而不是稻草。所以你要弄一个&b干草块&r和一个&b雕刻过的南瓜&r来创造出这些新朋友们！&6放下干草块，然后将雕刻南瓜放在干草块上面&r，这样你就能看着它焕发生机了。
帽子突出了傀儡的可爱。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests36.titl: 给你的稻草傀儡一个帽子
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests36.desc: 帽子纯粹是装饰性的。伙计，它真的可爱过吗？
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests37.titl: 给你的稻草傀儡用一些小麦延寿
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests37.desc: &e稻草傀儡&r是一种脆弱且需要手动延长寿命和喂食的小家伙。
它们会随时间衰弱，也会受到其他来源的伤害，例如&a饥肠辘辘的家畜&r和&a雨&r。&6使用小麦右击&r它们来治愈它们。
默认地，稻草傀儡仅仅只能存活7天（游戏中时间）。你可以&a使用小麦延长它们的寿命%r。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests38.desc: &b命令鼓&r是一个允许你一次性命令多个驯服的生物的道具。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests39.desc: 如果你的宠物身上发生了什么令人不愉快的事，&b宠物床&r允许它们在早晨&a重生&r，只要把你的宠物推上&b宠物床&r，就能&6设置它们的重生点&r。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests40.desc: &b项圈&r可以用来为你的宠物命名，但项圈也可以通过被&a附魔&r来给你的宠物提供特殊能力。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests41.desc: &b宠物契约&r是一个用于&a多人模式&r的物品。你可以使用它&6右击动物&r，然后将&b契约&r交给你的朋友，当他们使用时，&a如果他们已经自行驯服过了&r，宠物将从属于他们。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests42.desc: The &bWayward Lantern&r will allow any lost pets to &afind their way home&r. Place it near your base, and if you should lose your pet while exploring, watch for them there.
If you &alose your pet in another dimension&r, you will need to &6place a Lantern in that dimension&r to get them back.
In &dMultiplayer&r, your pets will respawn at the &aclosest Lantern&r, so be careful in other people's areas.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests43.desc: The &bRascal&r is a lonely creature who dwells in &cMineshafts below y 0&r! What it spends its days doing is a mystery, but one thing is clear: it wants to play!
If you can &6find the same &eRascal&6 3 times within 15 minutes&r, it will give you a small reward as thanks.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests45.desc: Find an &eIceologer&r during a raid or in his secluded home. And then murder him. Because frankly, he deserves it.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests47.desc: 虽然并非所有的&e苦力怕&r都是敌对的，但如果你能击杀每一种苦力怕，那简直太酷了！就像一次世界旅行，十步杀一怕，千里不留行。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests49.desc: 如果你能成功击杀500个&e苦力怕&r，那么你将获得这个&b苦力怕刷怪蛋&r。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests51.desc: Defeat the &eIllusioner&r - if you can find him - and obtain his riches!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests52.desc: Defeat a horde of &eEndermen&r, take their SKIN and WEAR IT - oh, was that too much? Sorry. I got excited.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests53.desc: If you manage to defeat 500 &eWither Skeletons&r, then you deserve this reward: a &bWither Skeleton Spawn Egg&r, and a &bSpawner&r to put it in.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests58.desc: Prove your mettle by killing...wait, just one &ezombie&r and one &eskeleton&r? That seems pretty easy...
Maybe the next quests will be more difficult.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests60.desc: He's just a good boi. Don't let him stay out in the sun too long.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests62.desc: Raccoons are adorable but mischeivous nocturnal creatures which will &abeg you for food&r if you happen to be holding some.
They can also &asteal food out of your storage&r, so be careful when building in the wilds!
They can be &atamed by giving it an &bEgg&r and letting it wash it.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests63.desc: It's time to play &aGoat in a Boat&r! The rules are simple:
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests64.desc: Axolotls are cute lil guys, but they're also &astrong&r and &avicious&r. If you tame one, it will &afight alongside you&r should you decide to take on an underwater threat.
They'll also sometimes &agive you Regeneration&r, and once they do so, you'll know that you are &dbest friends 5ever&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests65.desc: &eTadpoles&r, otherwise known as \"the forbidden boba,\" are cute lil wiggly fellas who are particularly susceptible to &eAxolotls&r.
They're also susceptible to &bBuckets&r, and if you should capture one in such a way, then you've completed this quest.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests66.desc: The &eSlabfish&r is a rectangular entity which can be &atamed&r with &bTropical Fish&r.
Once tamed, you can &6right click&r to &agive them a sweater&r by equipping them with &bWool&r. They can also help you carry items if you &agive them a &bChest&r.
You can also &adye the chest backpack&r by placing a dye in that slot.
&eSlabfish&r will toggle sitting or standing if you &6shift right click&r them.
However, they will &donly follow you when you're holding &bTropical Fish&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests67.desc: Looking for a challenge? Why not craft yourself a &bGate Pearl&r? &dYou can craft any one you'd like for this quest&r.
A &bGate Pearl&r allows you to summon a &eGateway&r by using it on a block.There will need to be &asufficient space&r available, and &aanother Gateway cannot already be open&r.

An open Gateway will &dfail in a burst of lightning&r if it &acannot spawn a mob&r, any active &amob gets too far away&r, or the &awave timer&r elapses. Rewards will spawn from the Gateway as they are obtained.
These &eGateway&r provide a challenge for powerful players, and are a great source of &bMob Drops&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests68.desc: &e山羊&r是一种暴躁的生物。如果你偶然遇见一只，&a要小心它们的火箭头槌&r！
然而，如果你能让它&a撞到一个硬质方块&r，如&b石头&r，它就会掉落一个&b角&r。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests69.desc: Although &eWraiths&r are not hostile, they sure are spooky. Put 50 of them &aout of their misery&r to earn this ingredient in crafting the &bUndead Eye&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests70.desc: The &bDimensional Carver&r is an item which can &atear through space&r to teleport you to &cyour spawn point&r. Aim it at the air and &6hold right click&r to use. Be aware that this is &dsomewhat unstable&r.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests71.desc: You can obtain the &bShattered Dimensional Carver&r by &aplacing a Dimensional Carver inside a &bCapsid block&r.
It will then slowly break down the Carver without untethering its pieces from one another. This is &astrange, very old magic&r.
The &bShattered Dimensional Carver&r can be used to teleport 1 million blocks in whichever direction you're facing. &aNormally one must do this 30 times&r to access the Farseers.
However, this is &dboth buggy and very hard on servers&r, so we recommend &dnot using the Carver as intended&r.
Instead, use it to craft a &bFarseer Gate Pearl&r, an item which brings all the luxury and delight of fighting &eFarseers&r, right to your doorstep!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests72.desc: The &bTransmutation Table&r is an item which will drain your &aexperience&r in exchange for &atransforming your items&r.
You can &afeed the Table items&r for a chance at getting them back in exchange for something else.
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests73.desc: A &bGate Pearl&r is a contained ritual which will &asummon waves of enemies&r, and grant &brewards&r for completing each wave, and for defeating the challenge.

This item &asummons &eFarseers&r, a long-forgotten race of multidimensional spirits which inhabit metallic bodies. These entities &aare very powerful&r and can easily kill even the most powerful witch with a single &adeadly stare&r.
&6Press shift&r while hovering over the Pearl in your inventory to view information about the &acombat challenge&r. Good luck!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests74.desc: 亲爱的巫师们，要小心这个任务。&e鸭子们&r可能看起来可爱无害，&d但实际并非如此&r。
在这个世界的早期，&e鸭子&r们群居于世，游荡在河流之上，不停地发出嘎嘎声。这引发了&a圣鸭战争&r，在这场战争中，巫婆们怀揣着对成功的渴望，与他们的敌人进行斗争。并且杀死了大量的鸭子。
现在，你可以&6用16个鸡蛋交换&r获得&a一只鸭子&r。但要小心不要引发另一场&a圣鸭战争&r！！
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests76.desc: 这种难以捕捉的大型猫科动物可以在&c石岸&r和&积雪的针叶林&r中找到。为了长久的友谊，可以用&b羊肉&r或者&b鲑鱼&r来&6驯服该坐骑&r。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests77.desc: &e古巨龟&r是一种来自史前时代的古老巨龟，你可以在它的栖息地——&c温水深海&r中找到它。用&b鳕鱼&r和&b鲑鱼&r来&6驯服它&r。这只坐骑在陆地速度上的不足，在水中完全可以弥补!
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests78.desc: 仅能在&c蘑菇岛&r找到，他们能够使用&b糖&r，&b蘑菇&r和所有的原版&花&r来&6驯服&r。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests79.subt: a mount Cid would be proud of
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests79.desc: 可以在&c丛林&r中找到这种强劲又敏捷的生物。&6小心地接近它&r，用&b甜浆果&r或&b西瓜片&e来赢得他们的好感。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests80.desc: 这可不是人类最好的朋友……至少目前不是。&6可以试着给他们喂根&b骨头&r。可在任意&c针叶林群系&r中找到它。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests81.desc: 虽然它们十分罕见，但是这些野兽有时也可以在&c深处的洞穴&r中找到。要和它们做朋友，就得&6把你的珍宝拿出来&r……&b金&r、&b钻石&r又或者是&b绿宝石&r都可以。但要小心……它们可能十分&d危险&r。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests82.desc: 制作一个&b召唤之杖&r以绑定你的坐骑（&6用召唤之杖右击你的坐骑即可！&r）。你可以用召唤之杖命令它们坐下、跟随或者闲逛……并且可以从任意地方召唤到你身边！不过要注意：&a一个召唤之杖只能绑定一个坐骑&r。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests83.desc: 这种温顺又贪吃的蜥蜴喜欢在&c高山上的洞穴里&r休养生息，也喜欢吃&b南瓜或者看着像南瓜的东西&r。用&b南瓜&r、&b西瓜&r或者&b干草块&r来&6驯服它们&r，拥有一个自己的蜥蜴朋友。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests84.desc: 脆弱而又美丽，能带着你在空中飞行，这些飞蛾出没在&c黑森林&r地区里，&6给它们&b糖&r或者原版的&b花朵&r来赢得他们的信任。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests85.desc: 有时可以看到这不一般的鸟类……或者说是哺乳动物……又或者是什么东西……飞越&c山顶&r。喂给它们&b兔肉&r或&b羊肉&r来&6驯服&r它们，它们作为你忠实的伙伴，会&a保护它们的主人&r。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests86.desc: 在&c下界的菌林&r中寻找这些蝙蝠。它们作为杂食动物，会吃各种各样的东西，从&b蘑菇hr到&b鸡蛋&r再到&b蜘蛛眼&r……&a一定要带上些小零食&r，因为它们&d对玩家充满敌意&r！
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests87.desc: 要想轻松地穿越下界，可以找一只梦魇带你走，你可以在&c灵魂沙峡谷&r和&c玄武岩三角洲&r中找到它，并且该坐骑可以&a在熔岩上行走&r。用&b骨头&r或者&b煤炭&r和它&6做朋友&r吧。
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests88.desc: 这些&c珊瑚礁居民&r都很友善，它们是能干的游泳运动员，还有有很多花纹和颜色！可以用&b海带&6驯服&r一只水生坐骑！
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests89.desc: 这种爬行类坐骑在它们的原生环境中（&c沙漠&r和&c恶地&r），以&e兔子&r与&e鸡&r作为食物。虽然它们&d对玩家充满敌意&r，但只要&6给它们&b最喜爱的肉&r，就能让它们做你最忠诚的朋友
ftbquests.chapter.wildlife.quests90.desc: 这是一个极其罕见的景象，有时可以在&c有人居住的村庄中&r见到&e火鸟&r在附近飞行。据说火鸟的品味都很高，&6试试&r为它们的友谊献上&b金苹果&r。
